entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Location Allow Once vs Always #4790
  • FormattedText: Span BackgroundColor does not work #4788
  • App.OnTerminate #4786
  • Entry does not loose focus and keyboard does not hide #4781
  • Can MAUI.Essential be used/consumed in RCL Project ? #4779
  • MeasureText in microsoft.maui.graphics? #4778
  • FlyoutViewHandler not implemented on iOS #4777
  • Font Icons in Shell Tabs not showing #4774
  • Can't get BackgroundImage of ContentPage #4773
  • Blazor Hybrid WebView not able to Obtain GPS Lcoation #4768

Closed

  • ViewCell DataTemplate doesn't work in a Release build #4723

PullRequests

Created

  • Add single target build ProjectCapability #4791
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Remove dead code from MauiFactory #4789
  • Update ImageHandler and ImageButtonHandler to current conventions #4784
  • [ci] Add maui release yaml #4775
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Essentials.HapticFeedback refactored to interface and singleton #4651
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Vibration refactored to interface and singleton #4727
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials Barometer - alternate approach #4761
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Email refactored to interface and singleton #4623
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Core] Implement SizeChanged event #4541
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-general
  • Use unelevated button style on Android #4722
  • Address CreateInstance ILLink warnings #4769
  • Remove packages not used directly by MAUI [WIP] #4776
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add pending Picker events and notify items collection changes #4346
    area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • Annotate web Content items to avoid workarounds in Xamarin and iOS SDKs #4728
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Interfaced handlers for ContentView, DatePicker, Editor #4763
    area/controls 🎮
  • Interfaced handlers for Entry, FlyoutView, GraphicsView #4780
  • In BlazorWebView WinForms/WPF, don't require wwwroot to exist in bin dir in development #4782
  • [Windows] Implement Border properties in RadioButtonHandler #4416
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Essentials.Browser refactored to interface and singleton #4605
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.TextToSpeech refactored to interface and singleton #4747
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Oops, comma. #4770
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [templates] add global.json to pin to .NET 6 #4767
    area/templates 📄
  • Essentials.Geolocation WIP refactored to interface and singleton #4634
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Windows] Implement IsFocused property and Focus(), Unfocus() methods #4562
    platform/windows 🪟, area/a11y
  • Add handling and tests for TextTransform for SearchBar/Editor/Entry #4554
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Essentials.WebAuthenticator refactored to interface and singleton #4757
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Add pending events and dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Refactor Screenshot to use an interface #4699
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [iOS] Update DatePickerHandler and TimePickerHandler #3761
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Implement RefreshViewHandler on Windows #3299
    area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • Implement Padding property in ImageButtonHandler #4665
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Remove unsupported targets in Device class #4491
    area/Xaml </>, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Implement WebView navigation events #4443
    area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • Fix ProjectReference for Controls targeting/runtime pack projects #3689
  • Essentials.Compass refactored to interface and singleton #4615
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Magnetometer refactored to interface and singleton #4652
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Blazor Android/Windows Open Links in Browser with Configurability #4645
    area/blazor 🕸️
